bus_routes.title: SSN Bus Route - Chennai Central
bus_routes.description: Daily bus service from Chennai Central Railway Station to SSN College of Engineering. Peak hours: 7:30 AM, 8:30 AM (Morning), 5:30 PM, 6:30 PM (Evening). Contact: transport@ssn.edu.in for more details.

comments.name: Parent Kumar
comments.comment: Very helpful for new students! Thank you for providing clear timings.

comments.name: Student Priya
comments.comment: Is this route available on weekends too?
